context: I failed to follow through on a commitment I made to you
letters:
Dear Dad,

I hope this note finds you well. I want to take a moment to sincerely apologize for not following through on the commitment I made to you. I understand how important it was, and I regret any disappointment I may have caused.

I had every intention of meeting that commitment, but I let distractions get in the way. I realize now that my actions have consequences, and I hate that Iâ€™ve let you down. You have always been there for me, and I should have shown you the same respect and reliability in return.

I know that I need to do better, and I am committed to being more mindful and trustworthy moving forward. Thank you for your understanding and patience. I hope to regain your trust and prove that I can be someone you can count on.

I love you and appreciate everything you do for me.

With all my remorse,

[Your Name]
